alert.note: Alert for Eastern Albany; Eastern Columbia; Eastern Greene; Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Schoharie; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Western Albany; Western Columbia; Western Greene; Western Rensselaer; Western Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 3:28AM EST until February 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Some sleet could mix in Friday morning. * WHERE...The Mohawk Valley, Capital District, northern and central Taconics, Schoharie Valley, Helderbergs, northern Catskills, northern portions of the mid Hudson Valley and the Berkshires. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Maximum snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hours are expected, mainly Friday morning. Snow may mix with or briefly change to sleet Friday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
